q1.question: Berapa lama ambil masa untuk setup?
q1.answer: 5 minit je! Sign up dengan Google, pilih template, isi details, done. Kalau you nak customize lagi detail (warna, music, wishlist), boleh ambil 10-15 minit.

q2.question: Boleh tetamu RSVP tanpa account?
q2.answer: Yes! Tetamu hanya perlu click link, isi form RSVP, done. No sign up required untuk guests.

q3.question: Macam mana wishlist work?
q3.answer: You add wishlist items dari Shopee/Lazada/Tiktok Shop, our system track guest's options. Bila tetamu pilih, kita disable the item. No duplicated gifts!

q4.question: Boleh share link kat mana?
q4.answer: Anywhere! WhatsApp, Instagram story, Facebook, email—wherever you want. Link is yours to share.

q5.question: Kalau tetamu takde smartphone?
q5.answer: Link boleh bukak kat desktop juga. Design responsive, so it looks good everywhere. But realistically, 95% of Malaysians have smartphones now.

q6.question: Data tetamu secure tak?
q6.answer: 100%. We use Convex (enterprise-grade database), HTTPS encryption, and follow Malaysian data protection standards. Your data is safe.

q7.question: Boleh refund?
q7.answer: Since it's digital product and you get instant access, no refunds. But we have free preview/trial mode so you can test before paying.

q8.question: Bahasa apa available?
q8.answer: Malay dan English. You boleh set default language, tetamu boleh switch kalau nak.
